search_05_003/4301_0101_0100_10:
There you are, Torchic! I’m so glad you’re OK.
We’ve been looking all over for you!
search_05_003/4301_0101_0200_10:
Thank you so much, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I couldn’t have found him without you!
search_05_003/4301_0101_0400_10:
Wha—?! What’s gotten into you, Torchic?
I didn’t even say anything...
search_05_003/4301_0401_0600_10:
What? H-hold on a second! I never said anything
about a battle.
search_05_003/4301_0402_0800_10:
Challenge? As in a battle?! Hold on a second!
I never said anything about a battle.
search_05_003/4301_0101_0900_10:
Wait... I don’t even know why I said that. I DO
want to battle you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
It’s just that...
search_05_003/4301_0101_1000_10:
I think my gut reaction is still to be nervous
and afraid. But deep down, I want to battle
you more than anything!
search_05_003/4301_0101_1100_10:
Torchic could sense what I was really feeling,
couldn’t you, buddy? Thanks for giving me
the push I needed.
search_05_003/4301_0101_1200_10:
All right! Get ready for a battle that’s
as good as—no, BETTER than that last
one with the scary guy!
search_05_003/4301_0401_1400_10:
Great! Neither do I! Torchic and I plan to show
you everything we’ve got!
search_05_003/4301_0302_1500_10: Give me a second to prepare!
search_05_003/4301_0402_1600_10:
Sure, I can do that! Torchic and I are ready
whenever you are!
search_05_003/4301_0102_0100_10:
I believe in my partner! If Torchic wants to win,
I’ll be right there, fighting hard with him.
search_05_003/4301_0501_0100_10: Hehe... It looks like we lost this time.
search_05_003/4301_0501_0200_10:
I’m sorry, Torchic. Either way, it was an
amazing battle!
search_05_003/4301_0401_0400_10:
Yeah! I never knew Pokémon battling could be
this much fun!
search_05_003/4301_0402_0600_10:
Yeah! I honestly never knew Pokémon battling
could be this much fun!
search_05_003/4301_0501_0700_10:
I think I have Torchic to thank for that. After all,
it was his confidence in me that encouraged me
to jump into the battle.
search_05_003/4301_0501_0800_10: The old me would have just run away.
search_05_003/4301_0501_0900_10:
I would have been way too afraid to challenge
a strong Trainer like you.
search_05_003/4301_0501_1000_10:
Thanks, Torchic. And thanks to you for such an
amazing battle, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
search_05_003/4301_0501_1100_10:
Torchic and I are going to keep getting stronger
and stronger. Next time we battle, I bet it will
be even more fun!
search_05_003/4301_0501_1200_10:
That reminds me... Can I ask you a big favor,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
search_05_003/4301_0501_1300_10:
I know it’s a lot to ask, but I have this Pokémon
that I really want you to raise.
search_05_003/4301_0501_1300_11: Oh, no! It’s not my buddy, Torchic!
search_05_003/4301_0501_1300_12:
It’s actually a second Torchic that I brought with
me to Pasio.
search_05_003/4301_0501_1300_13:
Meeting you and getting the chance to battle
you has really changed me for the better,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
search_05_003/4301_0501_1300_14:
You’re the perfect person to raise this Torchic!
I really hope you’ll consider it.
search_05_003/4301_0501_1400_10:
I’m sure that during my adventure with Torchic
I’ll still come up against things that make me
feel nervous and afraid.
search_05_003/4301_0501_1500_10:
But when that happens, I’ll know that somewhere
out there, you’re doing your best with Torchic—
just like me!
search_05_003/4301_0501_1600_10:
And knowing that will encourage me to stand up
and fight hard, too!
search_05_003/4301_0501_1700_10:
So what do you say?
Will you raise this Torchic for me?
